resources.string: Agriwaves TV is an internet-based platform dedicated to promoting agriculture as an attractive industry and showcasing inspiring stories and innovations in agribusiness across Africa. With a variety of cutting edge entertaining and informative content, we are committed to advocating for youth involvement in agribusiness, changing peopleâ€™s outlook of agriculture in classic style, and stirring massive public interest in the agricultural industry.

Also at the heart of Agriwaves TV is the drive to save the planet from climate change and environmental degradation through illuminating programmes that propel change in behavioral systems and environmental practices, rapid information and knowledge dissemination about environmental issues and mobilizing the public for climate change activism and consciousness. Agriwaves TV (ATV) is a creation of Rozella Media Limited .

From amazing farms to corporate spaces, laboratories, streets and homes of Africans, ATV showcases innovation, business and passion - sharing the exciting journeys of people adding value to society through agriculture, agro-allied ventures and protecting the environment. ATV travels thousands of miles from cities to villages, climbing hills, crossing rivers and streams and entering tropical forests and grasslands to show you everything about agriculture and environment in Africa.

At ATV, we display a heritage of a productive agricultural continent that makes food security and economic prosperity a top priority. We feature agropreneurs, environmentalists, policymakers, inventors, researchers, scientists, marketers, investors, economists, farmers, businessmen and everyone involved in agribusiness, nutrition and environment industries. We track and celebrate a generation working to feed and secure a brighter future for all and sundry.
